trans-unit.source: ATA monitors your domain controller network traffic by utilizing port mirroring to an ATA Gateway using physical or virtual switches, or by deploying the ATA Lightweight Gateway directly on your domain controllers, which removes the requirement for port mirroring.
trans-unit.target: ATA monitors your domain controller network traffic by utilizing port mirroring to an ATA Gateway using physical or virtual switches, or by deploying the ATA Lightweight Gateway directly on your domain controllers, which removes the requirement for port mirroring.

trans-unit.source: In addition, ATA can leverage Windows events (forwarded directly from your domain controllers or from a SIEM server) and analyze the data for attacks and threats.
trans-unit.target: In addition, ATA can leverage Windows events (forwarded directly from your domain controllers or from a SIEM server) and analyze the data for attacks and threats.

trans-unit.source: This section describes the flow of network and event capturing and drills down to describe the functionality of the main components of ATA: the ATA Gateway, ATA Lightweight Gateway (which has the same core functionality as the ATA Gateway) and the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: This section describes the flow of network and event capturing and drills down to describe the functionality of the main components of ATA: the ATA Gateway, ATA Lightweight Gateway (which has the same core functionality as the ATA Gateway) and the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: ATA Components
trans-unit.target: ATA Components

trans-unit.source: ATA consists of the following:
trans-unit.target: ATA consists of the following:

trans-unit.source: **ATA Center**
trans-unit.target: **ATA Center**

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center receives data from any ATA Gateways and/or ATA Lightweight Gateways you deploy.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center receives data from any ATA Gateways and/or ATA Lightweight Gateways you deploy.

trans-unit.source: **ATA Gateway**
trans-unit.target: **ATA Gateway**

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway is installed on a dedicated server that monitors the traffic from your domain controllers using either port mirroring or a network TAP.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway is installed on a dedicated server that monitors the traffic from your domain controllers using either port mirroring or a network TAP.

trans-unit.source: **ATA Lightweight Gateway**
trans-unit.target: **ATA Lightweight Gateway**

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway is installed directly on your domain controllers and monitors their traffic directly, without the need for a dedicated server or configuration of port mirroring.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway is installed directly on your domain controllers and monitors their traffic directly, without the need for a dedicated server or configuration of port mirroring.

trans-unit.source: It is an alternative to the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: It is an alternative to the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: An ATA deployment can consist of a single ATA Center connected to all ATA Gateways, all ATA Lightweight Gateways or a combination of ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways.
trans-unit.target: An ATA deployment can consist of a single ATA Center connected to all ATA Gateways, all ATA Lightweight Gateways or a combination of ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways.

trans-unit.source: Deployment options
trans-unit.target: Deployment options

trans-unit.source: You can deploy ATA using the following combination of gateways:
trans-unit.target: You can deploy ATA using the following combination of gateways:

trans-unit.source: **Using only ATA Gateways**
trans-unit.target: **Using only ATA Gateways**

trans-unit.source: If your ATA deployment contains only ATA Gateways, without any ATA Lightweight Gateways, all the domain controllers must be configured to enable port mirroring to an ATA Gateway or network TAPs must be in place.
trans-unit.target: If your ATA deployment contains only ATA Gateways, without any ATA Lightweight Gateways, all the domain controllers must be configured to enable port mirroring to an ATA Gateway or network TAPs must be in place.

trans-unit.source: **Using only ATA Lightweight Gateways**
trans-unit.target: **Using only ATA Lightweight Gateways**

trans-unit.source: If your ATA deployment contains only ATA Lightweight Gateways, the ATA Lightweight Gateways are deployed on each domain controller and no additional servers or port mirroring configuration is necessary.
trans-unit.target: If your ATA deployment contains only ATA Lightweight Gateways, the ATA Lightweight Gateways are deployed on each domain controller and no additional servers or port mirroring configuration is necessary.

trans-unit.source: **Using both ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways**
trans-unit.target: **Using both ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways**

trans-unit.source: If your ATA deployment includes both ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways, where the ATA Lightweight Gateway is installed on some of your domain controllers (for example, all domain controllers in your branch sites) while other domain controllers are monitored by ATA Gateways (for example, the larger domain controllers in your main data centers).
trans-unit.target: If your ATA deployment includes both ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways, where the ATA Lightweight Gateway is installed on some of your domain controllers (for example, all domain controllers in your branch sites) while other domain controllers are monitored by ATA Gateways (for example, the larger domain controllers in your main data centers).

trans-unit.source: In all 3 scenarios, all the gateways send their data to the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: In all 3 scenarios, all the gateways send their data to the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: ATA Center
trans-unit.target: ATA Center

trans-unit.source: The **ATA Center** performs the following functions:
trans-unit.target: The **ATA Center** performs the following functions:

trans-unit.source: Manages ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway configuration settings
trans-unit.target: Manages ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway configuration settings

trans-unit.source: Receives data from ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways
trans-unit.target: Receives data from ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways

trans-unit.source: Detects suspicious activities
trans-unit.target: Detects suspicious activities

trans-unit.source: Runs ATA behavioral machine learning algorithms to detect abnormal behavior
trans-unit.target: Runs ATA behavioral machine learning algorithms to detect abnormal behavior

trans-unit.source: Runs various deterministic algorithms to detect advanced attacks based on the attack kill chain
trans-unit.target: Runs various deterministic algorithms to detect advanced attacks based on the attack kill chain

trans-unit.source: Runs the ATA Console
trans-unit.target: Runs the ATA Console

trans-unit.source: Optional: The ATA Center can be configured to send emails and events when a suspicious activity is detected.
trans-unit.target: Optional: The ATA Center can be configured to send emails and events when a suspicious activity is detected.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Center receives parsed traffic from the ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway, performs profiling, runs deterministic detection and runs machine learning and behavioral algorithms to learn about your network to enable detection of anomalies and warn you of suspicious activities.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Center receives parsed traffic from the ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway, performs profiling, runs deterministic detection and runs machine learning and behavioral algorithms to learn about your network to enable detection of anomalies and warn you of suspicious activities.

trans-unit.source: Entity Receiver
trans-unit.target: Entity Receiver

trans-unit.source: Receives batches of entities from all ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways .
trans-unit.target: Receives batches of entities from all ATA Gateways and ATA Lightweight Gateways .

trans-unit.source: Network Activity Processor
trans-unit.target: Network Activity Processor

trans-unit.source: Processes all the network activities within each batch received.
trans-unit.target: Processes all the network activities within each batch received.

trans-unit.source: For example, matching between the various Kerberos steps performed from potentially different computers
trans-unit.target: For example, matching between the various Kerberos steps performed from potentially different computers

trans-unit.source: Entity Profiler
trans-unit.target: Entity Profiler

trans-unit.source: Profiles all the Unique Entities according to the traffic and events.
trans-unit.target: Profiles all the Unique Entities according to the traffic and events.

trans-unit.source: For example, this is where ATA updates the list of logged-on computers for each user profile.
trans-unit.target: For example, this is where ATA updates the list of logged-on computers for each user profile.

trans-unit.source: Center Database
trans-unit.target: Center Database

trans-unit.source: Manages the writing process of the Network Activities and events into the database.
trans-unit.target: Manages the writing process of the Network Activities and events into the database.

trans-unit.source: Detectors
trans-unit.target: Detectors

trans-unit.source: The Detectors use machine learning algorithms and deterministic rules to find suspicious activities and abnormal user behavior in your network.
trans-unit.target: The Detectors use machine learning algorithms and deterministic rules to find suspicious activities and abnormal user behavior in your network.

trans-unit.source: ATA Console
trans-unit.target: ATA Console

trans-unit.source: The ATA Console is for configuring ATA and monitoring suspicious activities detected by ATA on your network.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Console is for configuring ATA and monitoring suspicious activities detected by ATA on your network.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Console is not dependent on the ATA Center service and will run even when the service is stopped, as long as it can communicate with the database.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Console is not dependent on the ATA Center service and will run even when the service is stopped, as long as it can communicate with the database.

trans-unit.source: Consider the following when deciding how many ATA Centers to deploy on your network:
trans-unit.target: Consider the following when deciding how many ATA Centers to deploy on your network:

trans-unit.source: One ATA Center can monitor a single Active Directory forest.
trans-unit.target: One ATA Center can monitor a single Active Directory forest.

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one Active Directory forest you will need a minimum of one ATA Center per Active Directory forest.
trans-unit.target: If you have more than one Active Directory forest you will need a minimum of one ATA Center per Active Directory forest.

trans-unit.source: In very large Active Directory deployments, a single ATA Center might not be able to handle all of the traffic of all your domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: In very large Active Directory deployments, a single ATA Center might not be able to handle all of the traffic of all your domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: In this case, multiple ATA Centers will be required.
trans-unit.target: In this case, multiple ATA Centers will be required.

trans-unit.source: The number of ATA Centers should be dictated by [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).
trans-unit.target: The number of ATA Centers should be dictated by [ATA capacity planning](ata-capacity-planning.md).

trans-unit.source: ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway
trans-unit.target: ATA Gateway and ATA Lightweight Gateway

trans-unit.source: Gateway core functionality
trans-unit.target: Gateway core functionality

trans-unit.source: The **ATA Gateway** and **ATA Lightweight Gateway** both have the same core functionality:
trans-unit.target: The **ATA Gateway** and **ATA Lightweight Gateway** both have the same core functionality:

trans-unit.source: Capture and inspect domain controller network traffic (port mirrored traffic in the case of an ATA Gateway and local traffic of the domain controller in the case of an ATA Lightweight Gateway)
trans-unit.target: Capture and inspect domain controller network traffic (port mirrored traffic in the case of an ATA Gateway and local traffic of the domain controller in the case of an ATA Lightweight Gateway)

trans-unit.source: Receive Windows events from SIEM or Syslog servers, or from domain controllers using Windows Event Forwarding
trans-unit.target: Receive Windows events from SIEM or Syslog servers, or from domain controllers using Windows Event Forwarding

trans-unit.source: Retrieve data about users and computers from the Active Directory domain
trans-unit.target: Retrieve data about users and computers from the Active Directory domain

trans-unit.source: Perform resolution of network entities (users, groups and computers)
trans-unit.target: Perform resolution of network entities (users, groups and computers)

trans-unit.source: Transfer relevant data to the ATA Center
trans-unit.target: Transfer relevant data to the ATA Center

trans-unit.source: Monitor multiple domain controllers from a single ATA Gateway, or monitor a single domain controller for an ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Monitor multiple domain controllers from a single ATA Gateway, or monitor a single domain controller for an ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The ATA Gateway receives network traffic and Windows Events from your network and processes it in the following main components:
trans-unit.target: The ATA Gateway receives network traffic and Windows Events from your network and processes it in the following main components:

trans-unit.source: Network Listener
trans-unit.target: Network Listener

trans-unit.source: The Network Listener is responsible for capturing network traffic and parsing the traffic.
trans-unit.target: The Network Listener is responsible for capturing network traffic and parsing the traffic.

trans-unit.source: This is a CPU-heavy task, so it is especially important to check [ATA Prerequisites](ata-prerequisites.md) when planning your ATA Gateway or ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: This is a CPU-heavy task, so it is especially important to check [ATA Prerequisites](ata-prerequisites.md) when planning your ATA Gateway or ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Event Listener
trans-unit.target: Event Listener

trans-unit.source: The Event Listener is responsible for capturing and parsing Windows Events forwarded from a SIEM server on your network.
trans-unit.target: The Event Listener is responsible for capturing and parsing Windows Events forwarded from a SIEM server on your network.

trans-unit.source: Windows Event Log Reader
trans-unit.target: Windows Event Log Reader

trans-unit.source: The Windows Event Log Reader is responsible for reading and parsing Windows Events forwarded to the ATA Gateway's Windows Event Log from the domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Event Log Reader is responsible for reading and parsing Windows Events forwarded to the ATA Gateway's Windows Event Log from the domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: Network Activity Translator
trans-unit.target: Network Activity Translator

trans-unit.source: Translates parsed traffic into a logical representation of the traffic used by ATA (NetworkActivity).
trans-unit.target: Translates parsed traffic into a logical representation of the traffic used by ATA (NetworkActivity).

trans-unit.source: Entity Resolver
trans-unit.target: Entity Resolver

trans-unit.source: The Entity Resolver takes the parsed data (network traffic and events) and resolves it data with Active Directory to find account and identity information.
trans-unit.target: The Entity Resolver takes the parsed data (network traffic and events) and resolves it data with Active Directory to find account and identity information.

trans-unit.source: It is then matched with the IP addresses found in the parsed data.
trans-unit.target: It is then matched with the IP addresses found in the parsed data.

trans-unit.source: The Entity Resolver inspects the packet headers efficiently, to enable parsing of authentication packets for machine names, properties, and identities.
trans-unit.target: The Entity Resolver inspects the packet headers efficiently, to enable parsing of authentication packets for machine names, properties, and identities.

trans-unit.source: The Entity Resolver combines the parsed authentication packets with the data in the actual packet.
trans-unit.target: The Entity Resolver combines the parsed authentication packets with the data in the actual packet.

trans-unit.source: Entity Sender
trans-unit.target: Entity Sender

trans-unit.source: The Entity Sender is responsible for sending the parsed and matched data to the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: The Entity Sender is responsible for sending the parsed and matched data to the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: ATA Lightweight Gateway features
trans-unit.target: ATA Lightweight Gateway features

trans-unit.source: The following features work differently depending on whether you are running an ATA Gateway or an ATA Lightweight Gateway.
trans-unit.target: The following features work differently depending on whether you are running an ATA Gateway or an ATA Lightweight Gateway.

trans-unit.source: **Domain synchronizer candidate**
trans-unit.target: **Domain synchronizer candidate**

trans-unit.source: The domain synchronizer gateway is responsible for synchronizing all entities from a specific Active Directory domain proactively (similar to the mechanism used by the domain controllers themselves for replication).
trans-unit.target: The domain synchronizer gateway is responsible for synchronizing all entities from a specific Active Directory domain proactively (similar to the mechanism used by the domain controllers themselves for replication).

trans-unit.source: One gateway is chosen randomly, from the list of candidates, to serve as the domain synchronizer.
trans-unit.target: One gateway is chosen randomly, from the list of candidates, to serve as the domain synchronizer.

trans-unit.source: If the synchronizer is offline for more than 30 minutes, another candidate is chosen instead.
trans-unit.target: If the synchronizer is offline for more than 30 minutes, another candidate is chosen instead.

trans-unit.source: If there is no domain synchronizer available for a specific domain, ATA will not be able to proactively synchronize entities and their changes, however ATA will reactively retrieve new entities as they are detected in the monitored traffic.
trans-unit.target: If there is no domain synchronizer available for a specific domain, ATA will not be able to proactively synchronize entities and their changes, however ATA will reactively retrieve new entities as they are detected in the monitored traffic.

trans-unit.source: If there is no domain synchronizer available, and you search for an entity that did not have any traffic related to it, no search results will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: If there is no domain synchronizer available, and you search for an entity that did not have any traffic related to it, no search results will be displayed.

trans-unit.source: By default, all ATA Gateways are synchronizer candidates.
trans-unit.target: By default, all ATA Gateways are synchronizer candidates.

trans-unit.source: Because all ATA Lightweight Gateways are more likely to be deployed in branch sites and on small domain controllers, they are not synchronizer candidates by default.
trans-unit.target: Because all ATA Lightweight Gateways are more likely to be deployed in branch sites and on small domain controllers, they are not synchronizer candidates by default.

trans-unit.source: **Resource limitations**
trans-unit.target: **Resource limitations**

trans-unit.source: The ATA Lightweight Gateway includes a monitoring component which evaluates the available compute and memory capacity on the domain controller on which it is running.
trans-unit.target: The ATA Lightweight Gateway includes a monitoring component which evaluates the available compute and memory capacity on the domain controller on which it is running.

trans-unit.source: The monitoring process runs every 10 seconds and dynamically updates the CPU and memory utilization quota on the ATA Lightweight Gateway process to make sure that at any given point in time, the domain controller has at least 15% of free compute and memory resources.
trans-unit.target: The monitoring process runs every 10 seconds and dynamically updates the CPU and memory utilization quota on the ATA Lightweight Gateway process to make sure that at any given point in time, the domain controller has at least 15% of free compute and memory resources.

trans-unit.source: No matter what happens on the domain controller, this process always frees up resources to make sure the domain controller's core functionality is not affected.
trans-unit.target: No matter what happens on the domain controller, this process always frees up resources to make sure the domain controller's core functionality is not affected.

trans-unit.source: If this causes the ATA Lightweight Gateway to run out of resources, only partial traffic is monitored and the monitoring alert "Dropped port mirrored network traffic" will appear in the Health page.
trans-unit.target: If this causes the ATA Lightweight Gateway to run out of resources, only partial traffic is monitored and the monitoring alert "Dropped port mirrored network traffic" will appear in the Health page.

trans-unit.source: In order to work with ATA, make sure of the following:
trans-unit.target: In order to work with ATA, make sure of the following:

trans-unit.source: Port mirroring
trans-unit.target: Port mirroring

trans-unit.source: If you are using ATA Gateways, you have to setup port mirroring for the domain controllers that will be monitored and set the ATA Gateway as the destination using the physical or virtual switches.
trans-unit.target: If you are using ATA Gateways, you have to setup port mirroring for the domain controllers that will be monitored and set the ATA Gateway as the destination using the physical or virtual switches.

trans-unit.source: Another option is to use network TAPs.
trans-unit.target: Another option is to use network TAPs.

trans-unit.source: ATA will work if some but not all of your domain controllers are monitored, but detections will be less effective.
trans-unit.target: ATA will work if some but not all of your domain controllers are monitored, but detections will be less effective.

trans-unit.source: While port mirroring mirrors all the domain controller network traffic to the ATA Gateway, only a very small percentage of that traffic is then sent, compressed, to the ATA Center for analysis.
trans-unit.target: While port mirroring mirrors all the domain controller network traffic to the ATA Gateway, only a very small percentage of that traffic is then sent, compressed, to the ATA Center for analysis.

trans-unit.source: Your domain controllers and the ATA Gateways can be physical or virtual, see [Configure port mirroring](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/configure-port-mirroring) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Your domain controllers and the ATA Gateways can be physical or virtual, see [Configure port mirroring](/advanced-threat-analytics/deploy-use/configure-port-mirroring) for more information.

trans-unit.source: To enhance ATA detection of Pass-the-Hash, Brute Force and Honey Tokens, ATA needs Windows Event log ID 4776.
trans-unit.target: To enhance ATA detection of Pass-the-Hash, Brute Force and Honey Tokens, ATA needs Windows Event log ID 4776.

trans-unit.source: This can be forwarded to the ATA Gateway in one of two ways, by configuring the ATA Gateway to listen for SIEM events or by using Windows Event Forwarding.
trans-unit.target: This can be forwarded to the ATA Gateway in one of two ways, by configuring the ATA Gateway to listen for SIEM events or by using Windows Event Forwarding.

trans-unit.target: Configuring the ATA Gateway to listen for SIEM events

trans-unit.target: Configure your SIEM to forward specific Windows events to ATA.

trans-unit.target: ATA supports a number of SIEM vendors.
